newsitem.title: UK: Asbestos provisioning hits T&N yr results.
newsitem.headline: Asbestos provisioning hits T&N yr results.

text.p: NOTE - Automotive components firm T&N Plc said it made an operating profit of 178 million stg, before asbestos provisioning costs, compared to 227 million stg in 1995. It said exceptional charges in 1996 totalled 540 million stg, including 515 million stg related to its provisioning and insurance cap already announced for potential asbestos liabilities, and 25 million stg in costs associated with its options on buying a stake in German pistons manufacturer Kolbenschmidt.
Because of the charges, T&N said it will pay a special first interim dividend for 1997 of 3.0p in lieu of the final 1996 dividend, payable on May 2 1997.
